summary: Retextures Arvak to be a light dapple grey bareback horse with glowing blue or red eyes.  Now includes experimental options intended to make Arvak start with his bone form & be restored to his corporeal one.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]CORPOREAL ARVAK
[/size][size=3]
This mod is designed for those who love horses, retexturing Arvak so that he is a very light dapple grey with eyes that shine either blue or red.

This particular coat colour appears to glow as well as the eyes, especially in full sunlight (at least on the lower settings that I play on) meaning that Arvak retains a supernatural appearance while also being beautiful & comfortable to ride bareback.

No other changes have been made & Arvak should remain exactly the same in all ways other than his appearance.  Please let me know if he is not behaving as he should!

This mod has been difficult for me to properly test as I do not have Arvak yet, I do not recommend using it at this early stage of it being uploaded unless you already have him, make a backup save, & can quickly identify whether the mod does what it is supposed to do without any unintended surprises (I don't foresee any problems, & I would really appreciate you reporting your findings either in the posts or via pm).

There are now also some "Restored" options - the intention of these downloads is for Arvak to initially have his vanilla bone form & be restored to his former corporeal beauty when you complete the quest & are able to summon him.  Please consider these two options experimental for now as I am unable to actually test them in my own game yet - a huge thanks to anyone in the position to do so who also spares the time to post whether or not they are working as planned!!!

Requires Dawnguard.


[/size][size=5]CREDITS
[/size][size=3]
Slof for the horse textures used.
Nakoichi (Shadowmere Blue Eyes & Glow) for the blue eyed horse mesh.
Alek (Convenient Horses) for the red eyed horse mesh.[/size][/center]
author: ElioraArin
